content.webTitle: Ben & Arn never travel without: Guitar | backing band | pair of knickers | sunglasses

fields.headline: Ben & Arn never travel without...
fields.bodyText: A necessity: La guitare. We usually get our inspiration when we are on the road and write songs as we go along. Also, when we are low on money we have to busk. A luxury: A backing band. Due to a rare outbreak of Lassa Fever, our usual musicians are in quarantine in Dieppe. A memento: We have a pair of knickers that someone threw at us during a concert once. The owner's name is on the inside and Didier hopes one day to find her. She is called HM Prisons. A lucky charm: Sunglasses. Didier is superstitious and never takes them off - he also has to wear these to avoid the fans. If only... The Eiffel Tower. I know this sounds like a cliche, but put it anywhere and we'll feel at home. Imagine you are in Pisa - plonk it down, whip out la guitare and strum Jacques Dutronc hits while sitting on top of the Leaning Tower watching the sun go down on the Tour Eiffel. Si seulement...  Perrier Award winners Ben and Arn, now known as Priorite a Gauche, are touring from March 7. Information on 09068 400222.
